TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit QualifiedAce extends System.Security.AccessControl.KnownAce

Docs.summary: Represents an Access Control Entry (ACE) that contains a qualifier. The qualifier, represented by an <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceQualifier"> object, specifies whether the ACE allows access, denies access, causes system audits, or causes system alarms. The QualifiedAce class is the abstract base class for the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAce> classes.
Gets a value that specifies whether the ACE allows access, denies access, causes system audits, or causes system alarms.
Docs.value: A value that specifies whether the ACE allows access, denies access, causes system audits, or causes system alarms.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetOpaque() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the opaque callback data associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object.
Docs.returns: An array of byte values that represents the opaque callback data associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Opaque callback data is present only in callback Access Control Entries (ACEs).

Docs.summary: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object contains callback data.
Docs.value: `true` if this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object contains callback data; otherwise, false.

Docs.summary: Gets the length of the opaque callback data associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object. This property is valid only for callback Access Control Entries (ACEs).
Docs.value: The length of the opaque callback data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetOpaque(unsigned int8[] opaque) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of byte values that represents the opaque callback data for this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object.
Docs.summary: Sets the opaque callback data associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce"> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Opaque callback data is present only in callback Access Control Entries (ACEs).
